Question.Subject: Should i do it or not? HELPPPP!?
Question.Content: OK so this one girl is messaging my sis's ex boyfriend on fb saying stuff about her thats not true. i can get her fb password by just hacking into her yahoo but i wont read any of her messages i just want to see what she sent. i know the answers to her 2 questions when you need to change your password. i wont mesage anyone or do anything on it. Should i do it? Do you think she would know its me or not? do you think she would call the cops or something like that?
Question.ChosenAnswer:
If you're just looking then I doubt she'll even know. But to be on the safe side, I'd just confront her.

Answer.Content: do it. life's short. jail is just like vacation anyway.

If you're just looking then I doubt she'll even know. But to be on the safe side, I'd just confront her.
